article.title: DRC Wins Air Force Logistics Services Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Dynamics Research Corporation (DRC) has been awarded a $13.9 million task order under the Logistics, Maintenance and Supply Support contract supporting the F-16 Program Office at the Aeronautical Systems Center at Wright Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio. Under the contract, the company will support the U.S. Air Force and foreign military sales F-16 programs.
